'''16w07a''' is the fifty-fifth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on February 15, 2016.<ref name="blogpost_16w07a">{{Citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160216045255/https://www.mojang.com/2016/02/minecraft-snapshot-16w07a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 16w07a|author=Searge|website=[[Mojang.com]]|date=February 15, 2016}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[File:Map Zoom 4.png|32px]] [[Map]]s'''
* Added sounds for making maps.

=== Command format ===
'''[[Gamerule]]s'''
* Added <code>disableElytraMovementCheck</code>.
** When set to true, disables the server checking whether the player is moving too fast (cheating) while wearing [[elytra]].

'''[[Sound]] events'''
* Added <code>block</code> sound events:
** <code>brewing_stand.brew</code>.
** <code>chorus_flower.death</code> and <code>grow</code>.
** <code>comparator.click</code>.
** <code>furnace.fire_crackle</code>.
** <code>iron_trapdoor.close</code> and <code>open</code>.
* Added <code>enchant</code> sound event:
** <code>thorns.hit</code>.
* Added <code>entity</code> sound events:
** <code>armorstand.fall</code>.
** <code>arrow.shoot</code>.
** <code>cow.milk</code>.
** <code>horse.eat</code>.
** <code>itemframe.add_item</code>, <code>break</code>, <code>place</code>, <code>remove_item</code>, and <code>rotate_item</code>
** <code>leashknot.break</code> and <code>place</code>.
** <code>painting.break</code> and <code>place</code>.
** <code>rabbit.attack</code>.
** <code>shulker.ambient</code>, <code>close</code>, <code>open</code> and <code>death</code>.
** <code>shulker_bullet.hit</code> and <code>hurt</code>.
** <code>snowman.death</code> and <code>hurt</code>.
** <code>squid.ambient</code>, <code>death</code> and <code>hurt</code>.
** <code>witch.ambient</code>, <code>death</code>, <code>drink</code>, <code>hurt</code> and <code>throw</code>.
* Added <code>item</code> sound events:
** <code>armor.equip</code>, <code>equip_chain</code>, <code>equip_diamond</code>, <code>equip_gold</code>, <code>equip_iron</code>, and <code>equip_leather</code>.
** <code>bottle.fill</code>.
** <code>bucket.empty</code> and <code>fill</code>.
** <code>hoe.till</code>.
** <code>shield.block</code>.
** <code>shovel.flatten</code>.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Elytra]] '''
* Are now only activated when jumping mid-air.
* The cape option in the options menu now also disables custom elytron textures.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Obsidian pillar]]s'''
* Removed the [[iron bars]] that were protecting the [[ender crystal]]s during the dragon fight.

== Trivia ==
* Unlike most of the first-of-the-week snapshots, this was released on a Monday instead of Wednesday.
* 16w07a was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
